actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-825.

official_title: Resolved, that the Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount already authorized.

summary.text: Provides that the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

titles.title: Resolved, that the Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount already authorized.
